mapper.insert: insert into lorry (LorryID, LorryModel, LorryCO, PathID, LorryYield, LorryBuy, yieldNotes) values (#{lorryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lorrymodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lorryco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pathid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lorryyield,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lorrybuy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{yieldnotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lorry set LorryModel = #{lorrymodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LorryCO = #{lorryco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PathID = #{pathid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LorryYield = #{lorryyield,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LorryBuy = #{lorrybuy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, yieldNotes = #{yieldnotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where LorryID = #{lorryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select LorryID, LorryModel, LorryCO, PathID, LorryYield, LorryBuy, yieldNotes from lorry
